item.title: Multi Threaded Queue Processing
item.description: I needed a way to run a bunch of jobs in parallel and I am use to using the Symfony Process Component for that. So this post will show how I did this in Laravel 4.3 via the Queue so I can remember next time. What will come out of this is a workflow as seen here We will create two Artisan Commands. This allows us to use Symfony Process to run numerous console commands in the background.
